title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not selectable on the first attempt. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed Behavior: The item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try selecting any item.
